full_threads.body:
Thank you very much. I am seeking clarification on https://www.huntingtonsaustralia.org.au/ as this page "isn't working"? I will get back to you as soon as hear.

Thank you.

Regards

Sarah

Sarah Morrison​

National Communications Manager

MS Australia

1300 010 158

Hi Sarah, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://www.msaustralia.org.au/neurological-alliance-australia-naa/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Good afternoon


I am a bit pushed for time. If possible, could you please assist me.


I uploaded the attached image to here - https://www.msaustralia.org.au/wp-admin/upload.php?item=34749 but sizing is an issue when trying to replace here https://www.msaustralia.org.au/neurological-alliance-australia-naa/ (replacing Hunting's NSW ACT image).


The link should go to www.huntingtonsaustralia.org.au


Thank you. Can you let me know when this is completed. I appreciate your help.


Regards



Sarah


Sarah Morrison​

From: Andrew Giles <Andrew.Giles@msaustralia.org.au>
Sent: Thursday, August 18, 2022 11:10 AM
To: Jeremy Henderson <jeremy.henderson@msaustralia.org.au>; Sarah Morrison <sarah.morrison@msaustralia.org.au>
Subject: FOR ACTION PLEASE: FW: NAA web page


Hi Jeremy and Sarah,


Please see email below from Lewis Kaplan at Huntington's regarding a change to the NAA page on our website.


I've attached the Huntington's Australia logo referred to by Lewis below.


Tks


AG

From: Lewis Kaplan <lewis.kaplan@hdnswact.org.au>
Sent: Thursday, 18 August 2022 10:46 AM
To: Andrew Giles <Andrew.Giles@msaustralia.org.au>
Subject: NAA web page


Hi Andrew


Would it be possible to request a small change to our entry on this page please?


Neurological Alliance Australia (NAA) - MS Australia


The link should go to www.huntingtonsaustralia.org.au


The name should be Huntington's Australia rather than Huntington's NSW ACT.


The updated name / logo is the one used in the aged care submission
naa-position-statement-on-aged-care.pdf (msaustralia.org.au)


Thanks in anticipation.


Kind regards


Lewis

Lewis Kaplan, M.Hlth.Sci., BA (Hons), former FAICD

Chief Executive Officer

Huntington's NSW ACT acknowledges the Australian Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples as the first inhabitants of the nation and the traditional custodians of the lands where we live, learn and work.

Huntington's NSW ACT is committed to embracing diversity and eliminating all forms of discrimination. Huntington's NSW ACT welcomes all people irrespective of ethnicity, lifestyle choice, faith, sexual orientation and gender identity.
